The URL of the site is http://nbwrpg.tripod.com

A brief summary of what's happened recently is:

The Predacons launched two attacks at the Cybertronian Fire (the battle 
cruiser serving as the Maximal base), both were beaten back, as well as an 
attack launched by the Newcomers.

Hell Beast and some of the other preds retired, leaving Megatron in command 
of the Predacon forces.

Two Maximals are currently in the proccess of rescuing two Maximal hostages 
from the Alliance base, more Maximals are outside the Alliance base, ready to 
make a distraction.

Some Preadacons are in a cave, having just been attacked by some strange 
tentacle thing. Megs back in his base.

And Phobia is giving some technology to the Maximals.

That's all I can think of for now, Anolis, hope its enough.
